body:
We recently added protection against serializing internal types (api.Taint will panic) to prevent incorrect serialization (which has been a serious problem).

However, it turns out validation errors are calling json.Marshal on values, which includes taint values passed to server validation.  @thockin you added this for readability.  Can you suggest an alternative?  As long as validation is using internal types it runs square against the safety net to prevent (rampant) use of internal objects.
